name: pnp-create-sample-documents-with-openai
title: Create test documents in SharePoint with OpenAI API
shortDescription: This script shows how you can use the CLI for Microsoft 365 to generate test documents in a SharePoint Online library using OpenAI.
longDescription: While working with SharePoint, we most times need to create test content related to a specific topic. This sample script shows how you can use the CLI to generate test documents in a SharePoint Online library using OpenAI. The given example generates and uploads the specified number of documents to given Shared Documents library.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
